data.lyric:
[ti:CHICKEN TENDIES]
[ar:Clinton Kane]
[al:CHICKEN TENDIES]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]CHICKEN TENDIES - Clinton Kane
[00:03.19]Lyrics by：Clinton Kane/Steve Rusch
[00:06.38]Composed by：Clinton Kane/Steve Rusch
[00:09.57]I saw someone who looks just like you
[00:14.00]In the back seat with her hand out the sunroof
[00:19.16]I swear it was the dress that I gave you
[00:23.48]And I wonder if your favorite color still blue
[00:28.58]You're full of love and wild and free
[00:33.75]Chasin' every dream and possibility
[00:38.14]You're more than I could ever be-e-e-e
[00:47.33]I hope he treats you better than I ever could
[00:52.29]'Cause you deserve the world times two
[00:54.64]And our simple Sunday afternoons
[00:57.02]I hopе he's home for you even though I had to lose you
[01:01.91]For you to find who fills your heart
[01:04.26]Even if I'm not the one you choose
[01:07.53]Ohh ohh ohh
[01:09.65]Ohh ohh ohh
[01:12.14]Ohh ohh ohh
[01:14.29]Ohh ohh ohh-ohh
[01:16.89]I thought I caught a glimpse of me and you
[01:21.17]In our kitchen where I cooked your favorite food
[01:26.57]And if I'm being honest I was a fool
[01:30.71]So say the word and I'll come runnin' back to you
[01:35.80]And you're full of love and wild and free
[01:40.97]Chasin' every dream and possibility
[01:45.37]You're more than I could ever be-e-e-e
[01:54.67]I hope he treats you better than I ever could
[01:59.42]'Cause you deserve the world times two
[02:01.84]And our simple Sunday afternoons
[02:04.25]I hope he's home for you even though I had to lose you
[02:09.07]For you to find who fills your heart
[02:11.44]Even if I'm not the one you choose
[02:14.61]Ohh oh-oh-oh ohh oh-oh-oh
[02:24.25]Ohh oh-oh-oh ohh mmm
[02:33.10]I hope he treats you better than I ever could
[02:37.86]'Cause you deserve the world times two
[02:40.23]And our simple Sunday afternoons
[02:42.57]I hope he's home for you even though I had to lose you
[02:47.45]For you to find who fills your heart
[02:49.81]Even if I'm not the one you choose
[02:53.13]Wooaaaah wooaaahh
[02:56.47]And I hope he's home for you
[03:02.48]Wooaaaah wooaaahh
[03:06.18]And our Sunday afternoons
data.trans:
[ti:CHICKEN TENDIES]
[ar:Clinton Kane]
[al:CHICKEN TENDIES]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:03.19]//
[00:06.38]//
[00:09.57]我看见一个人像极了你
[00:14.00]她坐在后座把手伸出天窗外
[00:19.16]我发誓她穿着我给你的衣裙
[00:23.48]我在想 你最喜爱的颜色是否还是蓝色
[00:28.58]在你身上我看到了爱与不羁 天性自由
[00:33.75]你追逐着梦想探索无限可能
[00:38.14]无论如何我都比不上你
[00:47.33]我就希望他能好好待你 比我做得更好
[00:52.29]因你值得拥有一切美好
[00:54.64]在以往属于我们的周日午后
[00:57.02]我希望他就是你的港湾 尽管我要付出失去你的代价
[01:01.91]让你找寻填补内心空洞之人
[01:04.26]即使你没有选择我
[01:07.53]//
[01:09.65]//
[01:12.14]//
[01:14.29]//
[01:16.89]我以为看见了你与我的过往
[01:21.17]我在厨房里做着你爱吃的菜
[01:26.57]若我实话实说我无比的愚蠢
[01:30.71]所以只要你一开口我就会奔向你
[01:35.80]在你身上我看到了爱与不羁 天性自由
[01:40.97]你追逐着梦想探索无限可能
[01:45.37]无论如何我都比不上你
[01:54.67]我就希望他能好好待你 比我做得更好
[01:59.42]因你值得拥有一切美好
[02:01.84]在以往属于我们的周日午后
[02:04.25]我希望他就是你的港湾 尽管我要付出失去你的代价
[02:09.07]让你找寻填补内心空洞之人
[02:11.44]即使你没有选择我
[02:14.61]//
[02:24.25]//
[02:33.10]我就希望他能好好待你 比我做得更好
[02:37.86]因你值得拥有一切美好
[02:40.23]在以往属于我们的周日午后
[02:42.57]我希望他就是你的港湾 尽管我要付出失去你的代价
[02:47.45]让你找寻填补内心空洞之人
[02:49.81]即使你没有选择我
[02:53.13]//
[02:56.47]我希望他就是你的港湾 
[03:02.48]//
[03:06.18]陪你度过曾属于我们的周日午后时光
